description: Discovered on New Year’s Eve 2020, the Champagne Cluster is a striking pair of colliding galaxy clusters revealed through combined X-ray and optical observations. NASA’s Chandra X-ray Observatory shows superheated gas stretched and distorted, exposing a massive cosmic collision hidden from visible light alone. Studied by UC Davis astronomers, the system offers a rare natural laboratory to explore how dark matter behaves during cluster mergers. Understanding such violent encounters could help unlock fundamental clues about the universe’s largest structures.
title: NASA’s Chandra Spots Champagne Cluster Formed by a Massive Galaxy Collision

description: NASA’s Curiosity rover has released a festive holiday postcard from Mars, blending a Martian sunrise and sunset into a single panoramic image. Captured on November 18, 2025, the view combines a blue-tinted morning sky with a golden afternoon hue, showcasing Gale Crater in striking detail. Created by stitching images taken hours apart, the artistic panorama continues Curiosity’s tradition of seasonal greetings. Beyond its visual charm, the image highlights the rover’s long scientific legacy and NASA’s efforts to connect the public with ongoing Mars exploration.
title: NASA’s Curiosity Rover Sends Stunning Sunrise-and-Sunset Holiday Postcard from Mars

description: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7's co-op campaign fails to grasp what makes Call of Duty campaigns great. There are no blockbuster cinematic set pieces, no memorable levels, and no checkpoints. Instead, Black Ops 7 delivers a half-baked co-op experience that feels like an afterthought.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Campaign Review: A New Low for the Franchise

description: WhatsApp AI stickers are quite popular. Here is a step-by-step guide for users who are looking to make AI stickers on WhatsApp for personalised New Year 2026 greetings. Make sure your app is updated to the latest version on iOS or Android before starting. Once you create an AI sticker on WhatsApp, you can choose to send, edit, or view it.
title: How to Create AI Stickers on WhatsApp for Personalised New Year 2026 Wishes: A Step-by-Step Guide

description: Oppo Find X9s is tipped to expand the Find X9 lineup in India, with its specifications resurfacing online again. According to a tipster, the compact flagship may launch around March 2026 and could arrive in India. Leaks suggest a 6.3-inch 1.5K AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate, a MediaTek Dimensity 9500+ chipset, two 200-megapixel rear cameras, and a 7,000mAh battery with wireless charging. The handset may come with a metal middle frame, an ultrasonic fingerprint sensor and an IP69-rated build.
title: Oppo Find X9s Key Specifications Leaked Again; Might Also Launch in India

description: Redmi Turbo 5 and Turbo 5 Pro are said to be in the works, and multiple leaks have already revealed their specifications and possible launch timeline. A new leak has now revealed the chipsets expected to power the Turbo 5 and Turbo 5 Pro. Both phones are said to run on Dimensity chipsets, which are yet to be launched by MediaTek, but could arrive in early 2026.
title: Redmi Turbo 5, Redmi Turbo 5 Pro to Be Equipped With Upcoming MediaTek Dimensity Chips, Tipster Claims

description: India’s tablet market saw several notable launches in 2025, with brands improving performance, displays, battery life, and productivity features. The lineup includes options for students, professionals, and casual users, ranging from premium flagships to value-focused models. Apple updated its range with the iPad 11th Generation, while Android brands such as OnePlus, Samsung, Poco, and Xiaomi introduced tablets targeting different segments. In this feature, we highlight the best tablets launched in India in 2025 and explain what sets each device apart.
title: Best Tablets Launched in India in 2025: Samsung Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra, Xiaomi Pad 7 and More

description: Written and directed by Cyril Abraham Dennis, Watusi Zombie is a recently released Indie Malayalam film that explores the life of a genius who must navigate his life through complex relationships, Gen-Z, and rumors.
title: Watusi Zombie Streaming Online: Know Where to Watch This Indie Malayalam Film Online

description: Astronomers using NASA’s James Webb Space Telescope have found compelling evidence that TOI-561b, an ultra-hot rocky exoplanet orbiting its star every 11 hours, still retains a dense atmosphere. Temperatures measured on both its day and night sides are far lower than expected for a bare rock, implying powerful winds and efficient heat transport. The discovery challenges existing theories of planetary evolution and suggests magma oceans may help replenish atmospheres even under extreme stellar radiation.
title: JWST Reveals Powerful Winds and Dense Atmosphere on Scorching Exoplanet TOI-561b

description: MediaTek Dimensity 7100 chipset was launched by the company on Tuesday. The new 5G system-on-chip (SoC) comes with efficiency improvements across various functionalities, as well as balanced performance and support for latest hardware. The new chipset is currently listed on MediaTek’s official product page, and becomes the newest member of the Dimensity family.
title: MediaTek Dimensity 7100 Chipset Launched For Mid-Ranged Phones, Brings Efficiency Gains

description: Cybercriminals are once again exploiting the festive mood, as we head into the new year, to target unsuspecting smartphone users in India. A new scam is said to be doing the rounds which claims to let users create personalised New Year greeting cards. But instead, it delivers a malicious APK file which can comprise smartphones to steal personal, deal financial loses, and compromise user privacy.
title: New Year 2026 Scam Alert: This WhatsApp Greeting Could Wipe Your Bank Account

description: Vivo V70 could launch soon in select global markets, as the smartphone has reportedly been spotted listed on Singapore's IMDA certification website with the V2538 model number. However, this is not the first time that the handset has visited a certification website. Recently, it was found listed in the US FCC database with the same model number. It is expected to be powered by a Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chipset, which also powers this year's Vivo V60.
title: Vivo V70 Presence on IMDA Certification Database Points to Imminent Release

description: OpenAI and Jony Ive’s mysterious artificial intelligence (AI) device has been teased multiple times in the last few months. From the AI giant’s CEO, Sam Altman, to Ive himself has hinted at what the device could be and what it definitely is not, but no concrete details were ever shared. However, a new leak now claims that there is not one but three devices under development.
title: An AI Pen? Jony Ive and OpenAI’s Secret Hardware Project Details Leak

description: Apple has hinted at upcoming changes to Apple Fitness+, suggesting new features or programmes could arrive in early 2026. A teaser shared on the service’s Instagram account points to a possible announcement in January, a time when Apple usually rolls out new Fitness+ content and Apple Watch challenges. While details remain unclear, the teaser has sparked speculation about broader health and fitness updates. However, an AI-based Health+ service is unlikely to be announced so early, given its reported later timeline.
title: Apple Fitness+ Teaser Hints at New Features Coming in January 2026

description: Anime fans can now look forward to Hell’s Paradise Season 2 on Crunchyroll. Continuing from Season 1, the series features action, dark fantasy, emotional depth, and an 8.1/10 IMDb-rated legacy, promising high excitement for returning viewers.
title: Hell’s Paradise Season 2 OTT Release Date Revealed: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Oppo Reno 15 Pro Max, Reno 15 Pro and Reno 15 have been launched in Taiwan. The new lineup comes with AMOLED displays and triple rear cameras. The Oppo Reno 15 Pro Max is backed by a 6,500mAh battery with 80W wired and 50W wireless fast charging. The Reno 15 Pro is equipped with a 6,200mAh battery, while the Reno 15 has a 6,500mAh battery.
title: Oppo Reno 15 Pro Max, Reno 15 Pro With Dimensity 8450 SoC Launched Globally, Reno 15 Tags Along: Price, Specifications

description: Xiaomi 17 Ultra could be launched in India by the Chinese smartphone maker in March 2026, along with the standard Xiaomi 17, a tipster claims. If this is true, the two phones might launch in the country later than previously anticipated. The unveiling of the handsets is said to be followed by the India debut of the purported Xiaomi 17T, which might arrive in April 2026. However, the tech firm has yet to confirm the same. The China-based company recently confirmed that the Xiaomi 17 Ultra will be launched in global markets in January 2026.
title: Xiaomi 17 Ultra, Xiaomi 17 Tipped to Launch in India in March; Xiaomi 17T Could Follow in April

description: Apple’s journey in the artificial intelligence (AI) space has been lacklustre. The Cupertino-based tech giant first announced its foray into the space with Apple Intelligence at its Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) in 2024. However, a new report now claims that the iPhone maker is now poised to turn its fortunes around in 2026.
title: Apple Could Emerge as a Major AI Powerhouse in 2026: Report

description: Asus is reportedly planning to start manufacturing its own Dynamic Random Access Memory (DRAM), as the entire consumer electronics industry grapples with the memory and storage component shortage. Now, a new report highlights that the Taiwan-based tech giant will also increase the prices of select PC lineup from January 5, 2026. This appears to be another countermeasure against rising component prices.
title: Asus to Raise Prices of Some PC Models as Global Memory Shortage Persists: Report

description: Telugu audiences can stream Beauty on ZEE5 India starting January 2, 2026. Starring Ankith Koyya and Nilakhi Patra, this romantic drama blends emotional storytelling with heartfelt performances, rated 8.8/10 on IMDb.
title: Beauty (2025) OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Ankith Koyya and Nilakhi Patra Starrer Online?

description: The latest expansion underscores xAI's ambitious push to compete more effectively with industry leaders OpenAI's ChatGPT and Anthropic's Claude by training increasingly advanced models. The company's supercomputer cluster in Memphis, Tennessee, known as Colossus, is touted as the largest in the world.
title: Elon Musk's xAI Buys Third Building to Expand AI Compute Power

description: LG Electronics has announced a new Xboom speaker lineup ahead of CES 2026, expanding its collaboration with Will.i.am. The range includes four portable models, Stage 501, Blast, Mini, and Rock, designed for home, party, and outdoor use. All speakers feature AI-based sound tuning and lighting adjustments. Key highlights include karaoke support on Stage 501, long battery life on Blast, compact design on Mini, and rugged durability on Rock. The lineup will be showcased at CES 2026 and launch globally later in 2026.
title: LG Xboom Stage 501, Xboom Blast, Xboom Mini, and Xboom Rock Announced Ahead of CES 2026

description: Directed by Anal Arasu, Phoenix (2025) features Surya Sethupathi in a high-octane Tamil action thriller. Following a teenager caught in a murder conspiracy and juvenile custody, the film blends revenge, political intrigue, and boxing action.
title: Phoenix (2025) Now Streaming Online: What You Need to Know Tamil Action-Packed Thriller Starring Surya Sethupathi

description: Redmi Turbo 5 Pro could launch soon alongside the standard Redmi Turbo 5. As we wait for the formal announcement, the Redmi Turbo 5 Pro has reportedly received a certification from the China Compulsory Certification (CCC, aka 3C) authority. The listing suggests 100W charging support. The existing Redmi Turbo 4 Pro has a 7,550mAh battery with support for 90W fast charging.
title: Redmi Turbo 5 Pro Reportedly Bags 3C Certification, Charging Details Revealed

description: The Cyberspace Administration of China (CAC) drafted a new set of rules to regulate artificial intelligence (AI) companies and systems last week. The main focus of these rules is to outline the activities that chatbots and AI tools cannot participate in, as well as the practices these machines should implement to align with the country’s laws.
title: China Proposes New AI Rules to Safeguard Minors, Prevent Harmful Output

description: CD Projekt Red is developing Cyberpunk 2 alongside The Witcher 4. While the company has not confirmed an official launch timeline for the Cyberpunk 2077 sequel, a Polish analytics firm has estimated that the RPG will likely launch in Q4 2030.
title: Cyberpunk 2 Said to Launch in Q4 2030, The Witcher 3 Tipped to Get Third Paid Expansion Next Year

description: For all its promise of a billion-people market, the discretionary spending boom in the world’s most populous nation has been powered by “India 1,” only about 150 million affluent, English-speaking Indians in a handful of major cities. Now, with India’s economy headed toward becoming the world’s fourth largest, a new race is on to court the next billion: A vast, price-conscious yet aspirational consumer in smaller towns, eager for the conveniences and brands once reserved for the urban elite.
title: Fast Fashion, Delivery Apps Like Blinkit, Swiggy Tap India's Next Billion Consumers

description: The Samsung Galaxy A57 is rumoured to be in development as the successor to the Galaxy A56. Ahead of its anticipated debut, details about the purported handset’s display have surfaced. According to a report, the South Korean tech conglomerate is planning to source the AMOLED screen of the Galaxy A57 from a second supplier, in addition to its in-house department.
title: Samsung Galaxy A57 Could Use Flexible OLED Screens Sourced From Chinese Supplier: Report

description: A wave of launch failures marked the global space race in 2025, with rockets from the US, China, Japan, India, South Korea and Europe suffering fiery mishaps. From Starship test explosions to failed orbital insertions and crashed lunar landers, setbacks underscored the risks of rapid innovation.
title: Space Rocket Crashes in 2025: Why This Year Saw an Unusually High Number of Orbital Launch Failures

description: Apple has been granted a patent for its purported augmented reality (AR) smartglasses, according to a report. The patent document reveals the design and features of the rumoured Apple wearable, which was earlier expected to launch in late 2025. The Cupertino tech giant has reportedly managed to solve various issues that its future competition has been unable to. The company is said to fit most of the electronic components in relatively slim arms, which allow the smart glasses to resemble traditional eyewear.
title: Apple Patent Suggests AR Smart Glasses Could Offer Improved Comfort With Adjustable Arms

description: Meta completed the acquisition of Singapore-based startup, Manus AI, on Monday. The artificial intelligence (AI) company is known for its autonomous general-purpose AI agent, which can complete a range of tasks based on user prompts. The AI agent was released in March, and later the company introduced a subscription-based service to make it widely available.
title: Meta Acquires Autonomous Agent Developer Manus AI, Marks Its Fifth Deal in 2025

description: MIT researchers have developed a 3D-printable aluminum alloy that is five times stronger than conventional cast aluminum. Created using machine learning and rapid 3D-printing techniques, the metal remains stable at high temperatures. The breakthrough could replace heavier and costlier materials in aircraft engines, vehicles, and advanced industrial systems.
title: MIT Develops 3D-Printable Aluminum Alloy That’s Up to Five Times Stronger Than Conventional Metals

description: Samsung reportedly stopped the rollout of its latest Galaxy Watch 4 and Watch 4 Classic firmware update following reports of performance issues. The One UI 8 Watch update, based on Wear OS 6, began rolling out in early December. Some users found issues with heart rate tracking, sleep monitoring, and step counting after installing the update. It was expected to be the final major update for the devices.
title: Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 One UI 8 Rollout Reportedly Paused as Users Highlight Battery, Sensor Issues

description: Xiaomi is reportedly preparing to launch the Mix 5 as the next experimental phone in its Mix lineup, with leaks suggesting a debut ahead of Apple’s iPhone 18 series. Tipsters claim the device could feature a quad-curved display, an under-display selfie camera, and possibly under-display 3D face unlock. If confirmed, the latter feature would be a first for mass-market smartphones. The phone may launch at Lei Jun’s annual keynote, marking a revival of the Mix series after 2021’s Mix 4.
title: Xiaomi Mix 5 Tipped to Launch With Quad Curved Screen, Under-Display Selfie Camera With 3D Facial Recognition

description: Celestis, a Texas-based pioneer of space memorial services, is preparing its next deep-space mission, Infinite Flight, scheduled for late 2026. Launched aboard Stoke Space’s fully reusable Nova rocket from Cape Canaveral, the mission will carry cremated remains and DNA samples beyond the Moon into a permanent solar orbit. Part of Celestis’s Voyager programme, the one-way journey will send memorial capsules as far as 185 million miles from Earth. Infinite Flight follows the company’s 2024 Enterprise Flight and continues nearly three decades of space-burial innovation.
title: Celestis to Send Human Ashes Beyond the Moon on Deep-Space Memorial Flight in 2026

description: Apple launched the iPhone 17 series at its Fall event in September. The lineup, especially the iPhone 17 Pro and iPhone 17 Pro Max, have seen strong demand and their sales numbers have exceeded initial expectations. In recent months, however, users of both models have been reporting an unusual static-like noise or hissing sound from the speaker during certain scenarios. According to multiple forums, Apple has been made aware of the matter.
title: iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max Users Report Charging-Related Static Speaker Noise

description: Realme 16 Pro series, which will include the Realme 16 Pro+ 5G and Realme 16 Pro 5G, is scheduled to arrive in India on January 6, 2026, alongside the Realme Pad 3 5G. The new smartphone lineup will be equipped with a 7,000mAh Titan Battery, the tech firm recently confirmed, while teasing more specifications and features of the two handsets. Now, a tipster has shared the same online, along with the RAM and storage options for the phones.
title: Realme 16 Pro, Realme 16 Pro+ Price in India, Storage Configurations Leaked

description: The Japanese H3 rocket failed to place the Michibiki 5 satellite in orbit, marking the second launch failure in seven missions.
title: Japan’s H3 Rocket Suffers Setback as Michibiki 5 Navigation Satellite Launch Fails

description: The Consumer Electronics Show (CES) 2026 is all set to kick off on January 6. It is one of the world's biggest technology trade shows, held at the Las Vegas Convention Centre in Nevada. In recent weeks, brands have been announcing their upcoming showcases at CES. According to a report, Lenovo is gearing up to introduce several laptops, including the Yoga Slim 7x and IdeaPad 5x, powered by Qualcomm’s new Snapdragon X2 series processors.
title: Lenovo Yoga Slim 7x, IdeaPad 5x 2-in-1, IdeaPad Slim 5x With Snapdragon X2 Chips to Launch at CES 2026: Report

description: OnePlus 15 was launched in India in November and has just begun making its way to global markets like the US. The rumour mill, however, is already churning out information about its purported successor. According to a tipster, the handset, ubiquitously known as the OnePlus 16, could be in line for a massive camera upgrade. It is tipped to be equipped with a 200-megapixel camera sensor, and could share its imaging hardware with the rumoured Oppo Find N6.
title: OnePlus 16 Tipped to Feature Same Camera Hardware as Oppo Find N6; May Get 200-Megapixel Camera

description: Samsung has deepened its partnership with South Korean AI firm Nota AI to enhance on-device AI capabilities on the Exynos 2600 chipset, expected to debut with the Galaxy S26 series in early 2026. The collaboration uses Nota AI’s NetsPresso optimisation technology to shrink AI models and enable larger offline AI workloads on smartphones. Samsung will also further develop its Exynos AI Studio toolchain. Built on a 2nm process, the Exynos 2600 offers major gains in performance, AI processing, and thermal management.
title: Samsung Partners With Nota AI to Enable Advanced On-Device AI on Exynos 2600 Chip

description: TCL Note A1 Nxtpaper has been launched in global markets. The latest E-Note from TCL, designed FOR digital reading, writing, and creativity, features an 11.5-inch display with a 120Hz refresh rate. It runs on a MediaTek G100 processor with 8GB of RAM and 256GB of storage. The TCL Note A1 Nxtpaper has an 8,000mAh battery, and it comes with a Pen Pro stylus
title: TCL Note A1 Nxtpaper E-Note Launched With 8,000mAh Battery, 11.5-Inch Display: Price, Specifications
